input: Adam gave his friend an apple instead of an orange because his friend was quite fond of the _ .
William wants to file a lawsuit so he asks Aaron for help, because _ is a lawyer.
Brian suffers a lot from loneliness compared to Brett because _ has lost all of his family.
Cynthia recommended a high protein diet to Elena , even though _ was more knowledgeable about nutrition than she was.
I wanted to download new files onto my computer but there was not enough space. The _ was too limited.
He bought her a plain band but she wanted a ring with a gemstone - the _ was much pricier.
It took me longer to do the drawing of the house than the drawing of the tree because the _ was basic.
Sarah had a difficult childhood but Kayla had a spoiled one. _ never received gifts on their birthday.
Although he was 50, James wanted to go skiing with his boyfriend but he wasn't very fit. They chose surfing instead because the _ was easier.
Amy decorated the eggs with glitter and it got on the book as well. The _ looked messy afterward.
Laura hates to cook more than Carrie because cooking is _ favorite hobby right now.
Even though the state is smaller than the country, it is better because the _ has lots of debt..
The throw cleared the fence but crashed into the wall, as the _ was so much higher.
She didn't want to calculate the cost of the car instead of the scooter, since the _ was expensive.
Victoria told Erin that she had never done any type of  skiing before.  _ was afraid.
We added strawberry flavor to the milk but not the cream, since the _ tasted worse with it.
